scripts.clean: npm run rm server/public pkg ut bin
scripts.postinstall: npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.debug: npm run clean && node client/node_modules/concurrently/src/main --raw "npm run build:watch" "npm run wait:start" "npm run debugserv"
scripts.mock: npm run clean && cd client && npm run mock
scripts.test: npm run rm ut && cd client && npm test
scripts.pkg: npm run rm pkg && node client/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp server pkg && npm run rm pkg/package*.json
